title: Divergence Theorem Applications: Hard Level
description: Answer all questions. Each carries 1 mark. Choose the most appropriate option.

questions.title: Using the Divergence Theorem, the flux of $\vec{A} = \frac{5r^{2}}{4}\hat{r}$ through the boundary of the region $1 \le r \le 2$ is equal to :
The region is bounded by $r=4$, $\theta=0$, and $\theta = \frac{\pi}{4}$. The flux contribution from the surfaces is approximately:
